name: Basic Plan
description: Perfect for beginners who want affordable access to essential gym facilities, including equipment, showers, and Wi-Fi.
features: Open gym access during staffed hours

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for fitness enthusiasts who want unlimited group classes, nutrition support, and extended gym access.
features: Free nutrition and meal plan guide

name: Premium Plan
description: Designed for dedicated members seeking a premium experience with personal training, 24/7 access, and luxury amenities.
features: Access to premium lounge & recovery zone
